name: Sales Dashboard using Tableau
points: Built an interactive Tableau dashboard to analyze regional sales across 5 territories.
Identified top performing and underperforming markets.
Delivered actionable insights that supports sales strategy optimization and improved visibility for management.

name: IPCheck AI Powered Suspicious IP Detection
points: Analyzed large volumes of activity logs to identify unusual or high risk patterns.
Extracted key features and metrics from raw data to detect suspicious logs .
Improved efficiency of risk tracking and monitoring by making results more accessible to non technical users.

name: RAG Personal Chatbot using FAISS and SentenceTransformer
points: Enabled Q&A retrieval by converting queries and prompts into embeddings.
Leveraged retrieval and embedding techniques to summarize and extract key information from large textual datasets.
